about.name: Woodie
about.intro_1: Hi, I'm Woodie. I'm a developer specializing in Linux environments and socket networking. After years of working with C++, I've transitioned to Rust for its memory safety advantages. Currently, I'm learning AI development to build applications with intelligent capabilities.
about: Hi, I'm Woodie. I'm a systems developer with strong backend expertise, particularly in Linux environments and socket networking. My programming journey evolved from C++ to Rust, embracing memory-safe for robust systems development. I'm have experience across the stack, including some cross-platform development. Currently, I'm expanding my skillset by learning AI application development to build intelligent systems. My core strength lies in server-side architectures, but I enjoy tackling challenges across different layers of the tech stack.
about.intro:
Hi, I'm Woodie. I'm a developer who loves working with Linux and building stuff for the server-side and socket networking. about.3: My programming journey evolved from C++ to Rust, embracing memory-safe for robust systems development.
